I am using the 20030710 together with an old workspace.

Could you please zip and attach the .metadata/.config directory to this bug ?
Thanks.

I downloaded the current M2 build, launched it, closed it and then replaced 
the .config directory with the one in the zip (I had to rename it as well).
Eclipse came up fine.

Could the problem be related to version change from 2.1 to 3.0 ?

It was named old.config since I "removed" it to force a repopulation of 
the .config directory.

I cannot reproduce the bug. It looks like the problem could have been caused 
by having a workspace created with the 2.1 version and then having updated to 
3.0 (which is not supported by the update mgr).
I will return it as worksforme, but if you can reproduce it on M2 or newer 
builds please re-open.
